page.name: Section A Overview: Linear Systems
page.content:
As we proceed through these lessons, we will learn how systems of equations can be used to find unknown quantities and solve problems.

When Nafy started her company, she could have used systems of equations to help develop Teranga’s snack mixes. The cost, nutritional content, and weight of the ingredients are variables that could help her create her recipes. You can also use systems of equations to help plan how to start your dream company. We’ll explore more later in the section.


This section includes 6 lessons:

  •     Writing and Graphing Systems of Linear Equations
  •     Solving Systems by Substitution
  •     Solving Systems by Elimination (Part 1)
